verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of the sons of Korah. Maschil. We have heard <WH8085> with our ears <WH241>, O God <WH430>, Our fathers <WH1> have told <WH5608> us <WH6467>, What work thou didst <WH6466> in their days <WH3117>, In the days <WH3117> of old <WH6924>.

Thou didst drive out <WH3423> the nations <WH1471> with thy hand <WH3027>; But them thou didst plant <WH5193>: Thou didst afflict <WH7489> the peoples <WH3816>; But them thou didst spread abroad <WH7971>.

For they gat <WH3423> not the land <WH776> in possession <WH3423> by their own sword <WH2719>, Neither did their own arm <WH2220> save <WH3467> them <WH3225>; But thy right hand, and thine arm <WH2220>, and the light <WH216> of thy countenance <WH6440>, Because thou wast favorable unto them <WH7521>.
Thou art my King <WH4428>, O God <WH430>: Command <WH6680> deliverance <WH3444> for Jacob <WH3290>.
Through thee will we push down <WH5055> our adversaries <WH6862>: Through thy name <WH8034> will we tread them under <WH947> that rise up against us <WH6965>.
For I will not trust <WH982> in my bow <WH7198>, Neither shall my sword <WH2719> save me <WH3467>.
But thou hast saved <WH3467> us from our adversaries <WH6862>, And hast put them to shame <WH954> that hate us <WH8130>.
In God <WH430> have we made our boast <WH1984> all the day <WH3117> long <WH3034>, And we will give thanks unto thy name <WH8034> for ever <WH5769>. <WH5542>[[Selah
But <WH637> now thou hast cast us off <WH2186>, and brought us to dishonor <WH3637>, And goest not forth <WH3318> with our hosts <WH6635>.
Thou makest us to turn <WH7725> back <WH268> from the adversary <WH6862>; And they that hate <WH8130> us take spoil for themselves <WH8154>.
Thou hast made <WH5414> us like sheep <WH6629> appointed for food <WH3978>, And hast scattered <WH2219> us among the nations <WH1471>.
Thou sellest <WH4376> thy people <WH5971> for nought <WH1952>, And hast not increased <WH7235> thy wealth by their price <WH4242>.
Thou makest <WH7760> us a reproach <WH2781> to our neighbors <WH7934>, A scoffing <WH3933> and a derision <WH7047> to them that are round about us <WH5439>.
Thou makest <WH7760> us a byword <WH4912> among the nations <WH1471>, A shaking <WH4493> of the head <WH7218> among the peoples <WH3816>.
All <WH3117> the day long is my dishonor <WH1322> before me <WH1322>, And the shame of my face <WH6440> hath covered me <WH3680>,
For the voice <WH6963> of him that reproacheth <WH2778> and blasphemeth <WH1442>, By reason <WH6440> of the enemy <WH341> and the avenger <WH5358>.
All this is come <WH935> upon us <WH7911>; Yet have we not forgotten thee <WH8266>, Neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant <WH1285>.
Our heart <WH3820> is not turned <WH5472> back <WH268>, Neither have our steps <WH838> declined <WH5186> from thy way <WH734>,
That thou hast sore broken <WH1794> us in the place <WH4725> of jackals <WH8577>, And covered <WH3680> us with the shadow of death <WH6757>.
If we have forgotten <WH7911> the name <WH8034> of our God <WH430>, Or spread forth <WH6566> our hands <WH3709> to a strange <WH2114> god <WH410>;
Will not God <WH430> search this out <WH2713>? For he knoweth <WH3045> the secrets <WH8587> of the heart <WH3820>.
Yea <WH2026>, for thy sake are we killed all the day <WH3117> long <WH2803>; We are accounted as sheep <WH6629> for the slaughter <WH2878>.
Awake <WH5782>, why sleepest <WH3462> thou <WH136>, O Lord? Arise <WH6974>, cast us not off <WH2186> for ever <WH5331>.
Wherefore hidest <WH5641> thou thy face <WH6440>, And forgettest <WH7911> our affliction <WH6040> and our oppression <WH3906>?
For our soul <WH5315> is bowed down <WH7743> to the dust <WH6083>: Our body <WH990> cleaveth <WH1692> unto the earth <WH776>.
Rise <WH6965> up for our help <WH5833>, And redeem <WH6299> us for thy lovingkindness <WH2617>' sake.
